title: I have two Odyssey Ziggs questions
body:
1: If I do get the Ziggs skin but not the chromas before the event ends, will I still be able to buy them in the store whenever I want after, or will I have to wait until he's available to others who didn't get in one of the special sale events like snowdown?
2: Why is his odyssey skin being made legacy but everyone else's are gonna be here forever?
